name: Automatically scan for artifact changes caused by app updates
description: Monitor every version change of an application to determine if there are changes to the way the app stores data
examples: Discussed in 'Puma: Automatically generating digital forensic reference data triggered by mobile application updates' (Claij-Swart et al. 2025)
references: Claij-Swart et al. (2025) Puma: Automatically generating digital forensic reference data triggered by mobile application updates, APAC 2025 (full reference TBC)
Claij-Swart et al. (2025), PUMA (Programmable Utility for Mobile Automation), https://github.com/NetherlandsForensicInstitute/puma
